ä¸»è¦æ˜¯å…³äºä¸€äº›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ¤æ–­ç›¸å…³å†…å®¹ï¼Œä¸»è¦åŒ…æ‹¬åˆ¤æ–­å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼ã€æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰æ±‰å­—ã€æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰å­—æ¯ã€æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰æ•°å­—ã€ç‰¹æ®Šç¬¦å·ç­‰ï¼Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æœ¬èº«å°±æœ‰å¾ˆå¤š Api å¯ä»¥å®ç°å¾ˆå¤šåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯¹äºåˆ¤æ–­æ–¹é¢å°±å°‘äº†ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿™é‡ŒæŠŠæ”¶é›†åˆ°çš„å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ•´ç†èµ·æ¥ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

object CharSequenceKtx {
    //åŒ¹é…ä»»ä½•ç©ºç™½å­—ç¬¦ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ç©ºæ ¼ã€åˆ¶è¡¨ç¬¦ã€æ¢é¡µç¬¦ç­‰ã€‚ä¸ [ \f\n\r\t\v] ç­‰æ•ˆ
    const val SPACE = "[\\s]"

    //åŒ¹é…ä»»ä½•éç©ºç™½å­—ç¬¦ã€‚ä¸ [^ \f\n\r\t\v] ç­‰æ•ˆ
    const val UN_SPACE = "[\\S]"

    //æ•°å­—å­—ç¬¦åŒ¹é…ã€‚ç­‰æ•ˆäº [0-9]
    const val DIGITS = "[\\d]"

    //éæ•°å­—å­—ç¬¦åŒ¹é…ã€‚ç­‰æ•ˆäº [^0-9]
    const val UN_DIGITS = "[\\D]"

    //åŒ¹é…ä»»ä½•å­—ç±»å­—ç¬¦ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ä¸‹åˆ’çº¿ã€‚ä¸"[A-Za-z0-9_]"ç­‰æ•ˆ
    const val DIGITS_LETTER_UNDERLINE = "[\\w]"

    //ä¸ä»»ä½•éå•è¯å­—ç¬¦åŒ¹é…ã€‚ä¸"[^A-Za-z0-9_]"ç­‰æ•ˆ
    const val UN_DIGITS_LETTER = "[\\W]"

    //åŒ¹é…å¤§å†™å­—æ¯
    const val UPPERCASE_LETTER = "[A-Z]"

    //åŒ¹é…å°å†™å­—æ¯
    const val LOWER_LETTER = "[a-z]"

    //åŒ¹é…å­—æ¯
    const val LETTER = "[a-zA-Z]"

    //åŒ¹é…å­—æ¯å’Œæ•°å­—
    const val DIGITS_LETTER = "[a-zA-Z0-9]"

    //åŒ¹é…æ±‰å­—
    const val CHINESE = "[\u4e00-\u9fa5]"

    //åŒ¹é…ç‰¹æ®Šå­—ç¬¦
    const val SPECIAL_CHARACTERS =
        "[ _`~!@#$%^&*()+=|{}':;',\\[\\].<>/?~ï¼@#ï¿¥%â€¦â€¦&*ï¼ˆï¼‰â€”â€”+|{}ã€ã€‘â€˜ï¼›ï¼šâ€â€œâ€™ã€‚ï¼Œã€ï¼Ÿ]|\n|\r|\t"
}

fun testSpace(): Unit {

    println(test4.trim())

/*    println(test5.toUpperCase())//å­—æ¯å¤§å†™

//    println(test5.contains(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.DIGITS)))

/*    println(test.matches(Regex("[a-z]*")))//æ˜¯å¦å…¨æ˜¯å°å†™å­—æ¯
    println(test2.matches(Regex("[a-z]*")))//æ˜¯å¦å…¨æ˜¯å°å†™å­—æ¯

/**
 *CharSequenceä¸ä¸º null æˆ–è€… empty
 */
fun CharSequence?.isNotNullOrEmpty() = !isNullOrEmpty()

/**
 *ã€ˆæŒ‡å®šè£å‰ªå‡ºsträ¸­openå’ŒcloseåŒ…å«ç€çš„é‚£éƒ¨åˆ†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‰
 * @param open
 * @param close
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence?.substringBetween(open: String?, close: String?): String? {
    if (isNullOrEmpty() || open.isNullOrEmpty() || close.isNullOrEmpty()) return null
    val start = this!!.indexOf(open)
    if (start != -1) {
        val end = indexOf(close, start + open.length)
        if (end != -1) {
            return substring(start + open.length, end)
        }
    }
    return null
}

fun CharSequence?.substringBetween(tag: String?) = substringBetween(tag, tag)

/**
 *é¦–å­—æ¯å¤§å†™ï¼Œæˆ–è€…è°ƒç”¨capitalize
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence.toFirstUpperCase(): CharSequence {
    if (isEmpty()) {
        return ""
    }
    return first().toUpperCase() + substring(1)
}

/**
 *é¦–å­—æ¯å°å†™ï¼Œæˆ–è€…è°ƒç”¨decapitalize
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence.toFirstLowerCase(): CharSequence {
    if (isEmpty()) {
        return ""
    }
    return first().toLowerCase() + substring(1)
}

/**
 *æˆªå–éæ•°å­—ï¼Œåªèƒ½æˆªå–ç¬¬ä¸€æ®µè¿ç»­çš„ï¼Œä¸åœ¨é¦–ä½æˆªå–ä¸åˆ°
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence.substringUnDigits(): CharSequence {
    val pattern = Pattern.compile("\\D+")
    val matcher = pattern.matcher(this)
    while (matcher.find()) {
        return matcher.group(0)
    }
    return ""
}

/**
 *æˆªå–æ•°å­—ï¼Œåªèƒ½æˆªå–ç¬¬ä¸€æ®µè¿ç»­çš„æ•°å­—
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence.substringDigits(): CharSequence {
    val pattern = Pattern.compile("\\d+")
    val matcher = pattern.matcher(this)
    while (matcher.find()) {
        return matcher.group(0)
    }
    return ""
}

/**
 *æˆªå–æ•°å­—ï¼Œæˆªå–æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ•°å­—
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence.substringAllDigits(): CharSequence {
    val pattern = Pattern.compile("\\d+")
    val matcher = pattern.matcher(this)
    val sb = StringBuilder()
    while (matcher.find()) {
        sb.append(matcher.group())
    }
    return sb
}

/**
 *ç‰¹å®šå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æ•°é‡
 * @param tag
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence.stringSize(tag: String): Int {
    return split(tag).size - 1
}

/**
 *å«æœ‰ç‰¹å®šå­—ç¬¦çš„æ•°é‡
 * @param char
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence.charSize(char: Char): Int {
    var count = 0
    forEach {
        if (it == char) {
            count++
        }
    }
    return count
}

/**
 *å«æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼æ•°é‡
 * @return
 */
fun CharSequence.spaceSize(): Int {
    var count = 0
    forEach {
        if (it.isSpace()) {
            count++
        }
    }
    return count
}

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰ç‰¹æ®Šå­—ç¬¦,trueæœ‰ï¼Œfalseæ²¡æœ‰
 */
fun CharSequence.isHasSpecial() = contains(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.SPECIAL_CHARACTERS))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰æ±‰å­—,trueæœ‰ï¼Œfalseæ²¡æœ‰
 */
fun CharSequence.isHasChinese() = contains(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.CHINESE))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å…¨æ˜¯æ±‰å­—
 */
fun CharSequence.isChinese() = matches(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.CHINESE + "+"))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰å°å†™å­—æ¯,trueæœ‰ï¼Œfalseæ²¡æœ‰
 */
fun CharSequence.isHasLower() = contains(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.LOWER_LETTER))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å…¨æ˜¯å¤§å†™å­—æ¯
 */
fun CharSequence.isLower() = matches(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.LOWER_LETTER + "+"))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰å¤§å†™å­—æ¯,trueæœ‰ï¼Œfalseæ²¡æœ‰
 */
fun CharSequence.isHasCapital() = contains(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.UPPERCASE_LETTER))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å…¨æ˜¯å¤§å†™å­—æ¯
 */
fun CharSequence.isCapital() = matches(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.UPPERCASE_LETTER + "+"))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰å­—æ¯ï¼Œä¸åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™ï¼Œtrueæœ‰ï¼Œfalseæ²¡æœ‰
 */
fun CharSequence.isHasLetter() = contains(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.LETTER))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å…¨æ˜¯å­—æ¯
 */
fun CharSequence.isLetter() = matches(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.LETTER + "+"))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰æ•°å­—ï¼Œtrueæœ‰ï¼Œfalseæ²¡æœ‰
 */
fun CharSequence.isHasDigit() = contains(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.DIGITS))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å…¨æ˜¯æ•°å­—ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç”¨isDigitsOnly
 */
fun CharSequence.isDigits() = matches(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.DIGITS + "+"))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å…¨éƒ½æ˜¯æ•°å­—
 */
fun CharSequence.isDigits2() = Pattern.compile("[\\d]+").matcher(this).matches()

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å«æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼ï¼Œtrueæœ‰ï¼Œfalseæ²¡æœ‰
 */
fun CharSequence.isHasSpace() = contains(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.SPACE))

/**
 *æ˜¯å¦å…¨æ˜¯ç©ºæ ¼
 */
fun CharSequence.isSpace() = matches(Regex(CharSequenceKtx.SPACE + "+"))

/**
 *åˆ¤æ–­å­—ç¬¦æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ç©ºæ ¼
 */
fun Char.isSpace() = this.toString().isHasSpace()

entry.content:
å‰è¨€

åœ¨å®‰å“å¼€å‘ä¸­ï¼Œè·³è½¬å’Œç”³è¯·æƒé™è®¾è®¡çš„æ¯”è¾ƒéº»çƒ¦ï¼Œç½‘ä¸Šæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šä¼˜ç§€çš„åº“è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œè°·æ­Œå¯¹è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜åšäº†å¤„ç†ï¼ŒåºŸå¼ƒäº†ä»¥å‰çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚å…·ä½“çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒæœ«å°¾çš„å‚è€ƒåšå®¢ã€‚ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯å¯¹è¿™äº›æ–¹æ³•åšçš„åŸºæœ¬å°è£…ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

IntentKtx

è¿™ä¸ªç±»æ˜¯å¯¹æ™®é€šè·³è½¬çš„å°è£…ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸ç”¨ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯æ–¹ä¾¿å®ç°ç®€å•çš„è·³è½¬ã€‚éƒ½æ˜¯æ‰©å±•å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç›´æ¥åœ¨ Activity/Fragment ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨å³å¯ã€‚

å°è£…ä½¿ç”¨ç•Œé¢è·³è½¬

æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆå¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒå®˜ç½‘ Activity,Framgnetã€‚

1.å¯¼å…¥ä¾èµ–

æˆ‘è¯•äº†ä¸€ä¸‹åªå¯¼å…¥æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ï¼Œåªæ˜¯ activityå¯¹åº”çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸æ˜¯æœ€æ–°çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœæƒ³ä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ½æ˜¯æœ€æ–°çš„å°±åƒä¸‹é¢è¿™æ ·ï¼Œå¯¼å…¥ä¸¤ä¸ªå°±è¡Œäº†ã€‚ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯åŸç”Ÿçš„ä¾èµ–å¯¼å…¥ï¼š

//    implementation "androidx.activity:activity:$activity_version"

å°è£…åçš„ä¾èµ–å¯¼å…¥ï¼Œæœ€æ–°ç‰ˆçœ‹æœ€åçš„é¡¹ç›®åœ°å€ï¼š

maven { url 'https://www.jitpack.io' }
 
implementation 'com.gitee.quetzalcoatl:ActivityResultApi:0.0.3'

2.è·³è½¬ä½¿ç”¨

  1. ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆ ActivityResultLauncher,åœ¨è¿™é‡Œé¢å¯ä»¥ç›‘å¬å›è°ƒã€‚

  1. ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥è°ƒç”¨è·³è½¬
 fun testStart(view: View) {

    //å›ä¼ ä»»æ„å€¼

ç”³è¯·æƒé™

ç”³è¯·æƒé™å’Œä¸Šé¢ä½¿ç”¨æ­¥éª¤ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œåšäº†ä¸¤ç§å°è£…ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªå•çº¯çš„æ‰©å±•å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨ã€‚å¦ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹æ‰©å±•åšäº†å°è£…ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ›´æ–¹ä¾¿è°ƒç”¨ã€‚å…·ä½“ç”¨æ³•çœ‹ä¸‹é¢ã€‚

carme å’Œ write å°±æ˜¯è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªæƒé™ã€‚

        granted = {
            //åŒæ„æƒé™
        }, denied = {

ç”³è¯·å¤šä¸ªæƒé™

ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•åŸºæœ¬å’Œä¸Šé¢ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œè¿™æ¬¡å…¨éƒ¨æ”¾åœ¨ä¸€èµ·ã€‚

  //ktx å†™æ³•
    val multiple = requestMultiplePermissions(
        allGranted = {
            //å…¨éƒ¨åŒæ„
